basics.name: Felix Nguyen
basics.label: Data-obsessed daydreamer
basics.summary: Felix is an aspiring product developer/customer researcher who knows a little bit about everything.

work.summary: Applied Lean Innovation & Design Thinking methods to explore and test new business models and technologies for insurance.
highlights: Carried out over 30 customer empathy interviews and market research surveys & experiments to come up with product concepts.
Created 5 innovation opportunity reports on AI, Blockchain, Cybersecurity... using synthesized insights from secondary data research, competitive intelligence, and social listening.
Performed usability testing for a blockchain-based parametric insurance product using UserTesting.com and A/B testing for various design alternatives.

work.summary: Turn arbitrary requests from business stakeholders into fully working tools and applications. Create user stories, product roadmap, build data models, map new processes, devise application architectures, define wireframes/UI, write snippets of code, and run Usability testings. Make various innovations in CRM, Mobile App and Contact Center to improve Customer Experience.
highlights: Completed various Omnichannel initiatives to improve Call Center service level from 50% to 80%++.
Created a Customer 360 portal for rapid query of customer information for Call Center agents.
Initiated and managed Chatbot product for CRM, achieved 500,000 daily users and saved more than $50,000 per month.
Lead the creation of new Mobile Wallet application, conduct intensive user research and feature development.

work.summary: One of the first employees of a clothing/cultural start-up, in charge of building website and e-commerce system, as well as mananging Facebook, Instagram... channels and B2B channels.
highlights: Developed website and e-commerce platform; achieved daily view traffic of 5,000 and boosted sales by 20%.
Established and maintained companyâ€™s presence in large B2B platforms (Alibaba, EC2, etc.); increased awareness of the brand and secured five new contracts via those platforms

volunteer.summary: Bring smiles to kids born with cleft lips and palates.

awards.title: Beyond Excellence
awards.summary: Company-wide Creative Idea award for Messaging apps based CRM

awards.title: Mobile Marketing Association Gold Award 2017
awards.summary: MMA SMARTIES Gold Award for best CRM Campaign of the year 2017

references.name: Ha N. Ho - COO of FE Credit
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Felix Nguyen, his performance, ingenuity and motivation working as a Management Associate for FE CREDIT proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
